description: This is the main activity file for an Android application developed using Kotlin within a Flutter project. It defines the MainActivity class extending FlutterActivity, which serves as the entry point for the Flutter app on Android.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: A class representing the main activity for the Flutter-based Android application, extending FlutterActivity to integrate Flutter into the Android lifecycle.

methods.name: MainActivity
methods.description: Constructor for the MainActivity class, implicitly called during activity initialization.
